org.hl7.meta
Interface Datatype

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Metadata
All Known Subinterfaces:
ParametrizedDatatype, SimpleDatatype
All Known Implementing Classes:
DatatypeImpl, ParametrizedDatatypeImpl, SimpleDatatypeImpl
public interface Datatype
extends Metadata

Metadata for a datatype. Base interface for SimpleDatatype, ContainerDatatype, and ParamterizedDatatype

Author:
Skirmantas Kligys

Method Detail

getFullName

java.lang.String getFullName()
Returns the full name of datatype. For example, LIST<UVP<RTO<MO,PQ>>>,

Returns:
name of datatype

                           throws FactoryException
Returns Datatype Builder.

Throws:

getHandler

DynamicContentHandler getHandler(java.lang.String namespaceURI,
                                 java.lang.String localName,
                                 java.lang.String qName,
                                 org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
                                 throws FactoryException
Returns a handler for the data type, uses the configured data type handler factory.

Parameters:
namespaceURI - namespace of the XML element
localName - local name of the XML element
qName - qualified name of the XML element
atts - attributes of the XML element
Returns:
an instance of a handler
Throws:
FactoryException - if creating a handler fails

checkDataType

                      throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
check incoming value is validated against datatype. If validated, true; unvalidated, false

value -
Returns:
boolean
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
